data.title: Who Was Frank Lloyd Wright?
data.meta_description: Frank Lloyd Wright was an innovative and revolutionary architect who was influenced by his peers and his travels. In these ELA activitities, students will analyze the influences in Wright’s life that shaped him both personally and professionally. Students will go on to examine how influences in their own lives shape who they are now and who they will be in the future. Video clips explore Frank Lloyd Wright’s early life and career and show how his early life experience affected him later on.
